title: 616播咩歌?  [音樂台]  票選鼓舞士氣戰曲!

replies.msg:
希望大家用少少時間聽曬三首 起碼聽一半
②③真係好encouraging

①Emotional/Epic as fuck(有人整咗香港MV)
Melodic Dubstep
ILLENIUM - Pray feat. Kameron Alexander

[Verse 1] Lay my soul out bare by the river, mmm Let my bridges burn and deliver me, mmm Bring my soul back from the rhythm Of the chains that got me here It ain’t fair, no, it ain't, mmm  [Pre-Chorus] Mercy, mercy, mercy I’ve no luck with the man upstairs Help me, help me, help me  [Chorus] Won’t you pray? 'Cause she don’t hear me like she hears you pray So just pray for me Won’t you pray? 'Cause I’m too far from Heaven when I pray So just pray for me  [Post-Chorus] {Oh, won't you, won't you pray for me? Yeah}*4

[1st Drop]

[Bridge] {Mercy, mercy, mercy Help me, help me, help me}*4

[2nd Drop]

{Help me}*6

[Chorus] Won’t you pray? 'Cause she don’t hear me like she hears you pray So just pray for me Won’t you pray? 'Cause I’m too far from Heaven when I pray So just pray for me

[Post-Chorus] {Oh, won't you, won't you pray for me? Yeah}*4

[3rd Drop]

②鼓舞士氣encouraging
Progressive House vs Hardstyle
Hardwell & Headhunterz - Nothing Can Hold Us Down

[Verse 1] Oceans' red is running through my veins From where we are right now So firm we'll break through every wave We'll never turn around  [Chorus] I will guide you I will shelter you I will lift you up Nothing can hold us down Nothing can hold us down Nothing can hold us down I will guide you I will shelter you I will lift you up Nothing can hold us down

[Chorus]

③鼓舞士氣encouraging

We are never alone We are eternally connected with everyone The destiny of mankind is to unite Not to divide  A new day is rising Where there is unity, there's always victory Consistency is power Let's make the world ours  Consistency is power Let's make the world ours
